name: LostIt
0:
”Alexa, ask lost it to help me find my keys”
”Alexa, tell lost it to check my passport into the bedroom draw”
”Alexa, ask lost it to get the location of my passport”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lost it
des: Lost It will help organize your life by allowing you to store locations of items so you can be reminded later. For objects that have not been stored it will take you through a structured process to methodically find your lost item.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
